programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E14, 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert. When a second victim is discovered in a mineshaft, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.
MST3K: The Mask, 20221028000000 +0000, For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.

MST3K: The Beatniks, 19921125000000 +0000, When a hold-up carried out by his two-bit hoodlum friends goes tragically awry, Eddie Craneâ€™s bright future as a recording artist from the mean streets could be in jeopardy.

programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E14, A scientist and a reporter discover the lost city of Atlantis, a technologically advanced society.
Angel's Revenge, S07E22, Seven women fight drug dealers.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Radar Men From The Moon - Chapter 1: Moon Rocket
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E01, The first episode of the 1952 serial featuring Commander Cody's trip to the moon.

programme.title: The Crawling Eye
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Crawling Eye, S01E01, Things start to look eerily familiar to scientists Crevett and Brooks when mountain climbers begin losing their heads in the Trollenberg Mountains.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E19, Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.

programme.title: The Touch of Satan
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Touch of Satan, S09E08, An aimless young man encounters a rural family that seems to have some secrets.

programme.title: What About Juvenile Delinquency?
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E07, A band of no-good punks beat a guy for driving too slow and steal his mechanical pencil, before arriving to pick up their missing member Jamie, the son of the man they've just beaten.

programme.title: Moon Zero Two
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Moon Zero Two, S01E11, The crew stages their own moon landing pageant as they watch the film Moon Zero Two about an astronaut hired to capture an asteroid made of sapphires.

programme.title: Lost Continent
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Lost Continent, S02E08, A military team sent to search for a lost rocket ends up trapped on a mountain inhabited by dinosaurs in Lost Continent.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E11, Hallmark Original Series. Jack is hailed a hero after putting away the Tolliver outlaws.

programme.title: Prelude to a Kiss
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E12, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail is beginning to let go of her grief and look toward the future.

The Love Letter (Crown Media), 19980201000000 +0000, Romantic fantasy unfolds when a young man finds a hundred year old letter in an empty desk. Stars Campbell Scott and Jennifer Jason Leigh. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

The Magic of Ordinary Days, 20050130000000 +0000, Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII. Stars Keri Russell and Skeet Ulrich.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

The Blackwater Lightship, 20040204000000 +0000, Based on the novel by Colm Toibin, The Blackwater Lightship tells the compelling story of reconciliation between three generations of women that has been marked by decades of misunderstandings.

Remember Sunday, 20130421000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck waitress meets jewelry store clerk, Gus, but complications ensue because of his memory problems. A brain aneurysm three years earlier gives Gus a blank slate the second his alarm wakes him each day.

All Yours, 20160402000000 +0000, Cass, a high-powered attorney and single mother of two, is on the hunt for a new nanny after her precocious kids ran off the last one. Stars Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne and Jayne Eastwood.

Hello, It's Me, 20150927000000 +0000, A woman coping with the loss of her husband and the task of raising two children on her own meets a handsome, rich man but doesn't feel right about pursuing anything. Stars Kellie Martin and Kavan Smith.

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie works her magic to help Sam make a tough decision.

programme.title: A Perfect Match
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie considers John's adventurous job offer.

programme.title: Nemesis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E22, O'Neill is kidnapped by the Asgard and encounters a swarm of vicious metallic bug-like creatures on a mission to destroy Earth. O'Neill plans to blow up the ship and sacrifice himself, but can the team find another way to stop this apocalyptic plan?

programme.title: No Man's Land
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E01, After their alliance with the Wraith backfires, the team must find a way to stop two Hive ships that are headed for Earth. Weir orders to attack and Sheppard is forced to rely on Michael to help him save McKay and Ronon, who are being held prisoners.

programme.title: Misbegotten
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E02, Successfully using the retrovirus to turn an entire hive ship of Wraith into humans the team returns to Atlantis with their prisoners in stasis. Weir continues to defend her leadership in the face of an independent review being conducted by the IOA.

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E03, The team comes across a small village with a revered leader. Beckett soon becomes so enamored by his host he brings him to Atlantis. But soon, McKay discovers that Lucius is using some sort of pheromone to enchant those around him.

programme.title: Sateda
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E04, Exploring a village, the team is suddenly attacked and taken prisoner as Ronon had unknowingly lured the Wraith there. The villagers set Sheppard and Teyla free, who mobilize a strike force. When they return, the village has been devastated.

programme.title: Progeny
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E05, Dr. McKay discovers a reference to an abandoned Ancient testing site. At the site, the team discovers a vast metropolis supporting millions of Ancients. Eager to create an alliance, Weir is shocked when their leader Oberoth refuses the offer.

programme.title: The Real World
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E06, Waking up in a psychiatric hospital outside of D.C., Weir is shocked to discover that her entire experience in Atlantis over the last two years was all in her imagination. She learns that a car accident left her suffering from delusional psychosis.

programme.title: Common Ground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E07, Summoned to a planet by a communication code, the team is ambushed by Kolya, who has now created his own faction of Genii after being forced from the inner circle. While the rest of the team manages to escape, Sheppard is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Mckay And Mrs. Miller
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E08, McKay is called back to earth to convince his estranged sister, Jeannie Miller, to assist the Air Force. McKay and Jeannie travel to Atlantis and begin the experiment which is initially successful until a McKay from the parallel universe appears.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!
Stargate, 19941028000000 +0000, When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

Stargate Origins: Catherine, 20180619000000 +0000, 'Stargate Origins' follows Catherine Langford, whose father, archeologist Paul Langford, discovered the eponymous Stargate in 1928, when Catherine was a young girl. Young Catherine explores the mysteries of the Stargate in an attempt to save Earth.

Stargate: Continuum, 20080729000000 +0000, In this adrenaline-driven, action-adventure, members of SG-1 find themselves returning to a world where their history has been dramatically altered and the Stargate program never existed! Richard Dean Anderson, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks star.

programme.title: Santa Knows
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E14, Kelly considers filing sexual harassment charges against Monahan, but does not want to interfere with a fundraiser for the clinic. Val and David realize how much they mean to each other.

programme.title: Ready Or Not
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E15, Dr. Monahan forces Kelly out of the clinic. Brandon and Steve hire a new assistant, Janet Sosna; and bring David aboard as a music reviewer. Valerie cuts a deal with a bookie operating at the After Dark.

programme.title: Illegal Tender
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E16, David tries to make amends after his first music review gets the artist fired; Valerie ignores Noah's decree to halt the sports betting at the club.

programme.title: Crimes & Misdemeanors
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E19, Despite meeting Noah, Donna's hospitalized grandmother says Donna's fated mate is David, who moves out of Valerie's room; Kelly alerts Brandon to a potential story about an ex-con; Steve coaxes Brandon into a double date.

programme.title: Law & Disorder
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E22, Noah's civil trial begins. His attorney portrays Valerie as a golddigging tramp, and uses the gang's testimony to place Noah in a favorable light. David's record company experiences a shake-up.

programme.title: Aunt Bea's Pickles
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E25, During Valerie's surprise birthday party, Abby announces that she and Bill are engaged. Brandon receives a job offer from a major newspaper but faces a dilemma when he learns he is only being hired as a replacement for striking reporters.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E27, Image seems to be everything at the gang's five-year high-school reunion, where Valerie creates new personas for herself and David, while Andrea Zuckerman tries to hang on to her old one.

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E29, Kelly finds it impossible to trust Brandon as he works late every night for several weeks. Noah entertains Gwyneth, a longtime friend. David becomes extremely jumpy after being robbed at an ATM.

programme.title: The Fundamental Things Apply
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E30, Brandon and Kelly try to help a Bosnian refugee find his wife; Donna puts on a fashion show; Gwyneth takes a page from Valerie's book after admitting feelings for Noah; Steve learns Sarah is married.

programme.title: Dealer's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E03, Abby announces that she and Carl are planning to elope in Las Vegas, and asks Val to be her maid of honor. Kelly begs Val to let her tag along on the trip because she believes that Brandon is seeing someone else.

programme.title: Don't Ask, Don't Tell
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E04, Carl decides to annul his marriage to Abby because he believes that he has a future with Valerie. Kelly notices that a store is for lease and decides that she and Donna should open a boutique.

programme.title: Brandon Leaves
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E05, Brandon announces that he has accepted a job with the Washington bureau of the New York Chronicle. Kelly and Donna prepare to open their store, Now Wear This. Valerie seeks legal advice from Matt.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E06, Kelly decides to help Leah and her daughter skip town and assume a new identity. Valerie elects to throw a massive rave as a farewell party before turning herself in to the police.

programme.title: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E07, As Kelly and Valerie pack Brandon's belongings for shipment, Kelly discovers a letter in which Val advised Brandon not to marry her. She turns everyone against Val and gets them to boycott her Thanksgiving gathering.

programme.title: I'm Back Because
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E08, David is arrested for statutory rape and gets suspended from his radio show. Steve bristles at the news that his mother is dating her much younger co-star. Kelly's reaction to Dylan's return worries Matt.

programme.title: The Following Options
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E09, Kelly grows angry with Matt when he takes a case defending a tobacco company. Donna agrees to let a troubled fifteen-year-old girl buy a dress on layaway. Dylan takes his bullet-riddled Porsche out of storage.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E10, Dylan takes Kelly to Mexico for a day and buys her a gift, but Kelly rejects him to focus on her relationship with Matt. Dylan soon takes Gina to Mexico and buys her the same gift.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E225, The continued story of a 16-year-old who falls from a 50 ft. pine while trying to cut the top off. An 11-year-old initiates CPR when his teacher collapses.

programme.title: Indian Runner/Wave Runner, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E306, A man is seriously injured in a motorcycle crash. A teenager is injured when he's hit in the head by a waterski.

The Night They Saved Christmas, 19841213000000 +0000, A mother and her three children find themselves on a wondrous journey to the North Pole, where they alone can save Santa Claus and his massive toy factory from destruction.

Waking Up to Christmas, 20230101000000 +0000, On the verge of a massive deadline, a cynical workaholic is zapped by faulty Christmas lights while stranded in a small Colorado town and finds herself cast as the lead in an over-the-top Hallmark-style holiday movie.
12 Days of Christmas, 20200901000000 +0000, Two childhood friends spend their college winter break navigating reunions, romances, and even an unplanned pregnancy.

12 Dares of Christmas, 20230101000000 +0000, High school teacher Elara's quiet holiday season gets a jolt of spice when she accepts a 12 Dares of Christmas challenge from her sister while scrambling to ready her town for a Christmas exchange program with suave, opinionated French teacher Gabriel.

48 Christmas Wishes, 20191102000000 +0000, After losing an entire town's letters to Santa, two junior Elves leave the North Pole and attempt to blend into small town life as they set out to retrieve every missing wish before Santa's sleigh departs on Christmas Eve.
A Christmas Cruise, 20170101000000 +0000, When her best friend invites her along on a holiday-themed sail, an aspiring novelist unexpectedly finds the love of her life onboard.
A Christmas Hero, 20161203000000 +0000, Firefighter Jenny has fallen in love with Tom, but his ex-wife demands a reconciliation.
A Christmas Invitation, 20220923000000 +0000, It's Christmas and a dysfunctional family is brought together through a dying wish and an invitation to one last family holiday party.

A Christmas Karen, 20220101000000 +0000, Karen is an entitled middle-aged woman whose demanding nature has alienated her loved ones. After a series of instances displaying her privilege, Karen receives an intervention from some unconventional spirits.

A Holiday Engagement, 20120101000000 +0000, Jilted by her high-powered fiancé just before Thanksgiving, and terrified of disappointing her demanding mother, Hillary Burns hires an unemployed artist to pretend to be her fiancé over the holiday weekend.

Rebirth of Mothra 2, 19971213000000 +0000, Two young kids inadvertently unleash a giant sea creature which is strengthened from the abundance of modern-day pollution. Mothra's keepers, the tiny twins Moll and Lora, quickly rouse the gentle giant in order to combat this latest threat to peace.

Rebirth of Mothra 3, 19981212000000 +0000, In the final film in the new 'Mothra' trilogy, King Ghidorah, the most destructive of all the monsters, returns to destroy the Earth. In the end, Mothra is indeed triumphant and takes her place among the greatest of all monsters.

Godzilla Vs. Megaguirus: The G Annihilation Strategy, 20001216000000 +0000, Five years after Godzilla® terrorized the city of Osaka, Japanese scientists have developed a sure-fire way to finally destroy Japan's monster nemesis. Godzilla, Mothra, and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack, 20011215000000 +0000, When a series of terrifying natural disasters begin to plague Japan, including the inexplicable offshore sinking of a U.S. submarine, a mystic old man warns his nation that Godzilla has come back to destroy Japan.

Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla, 20021214000000 +0000, After four years of scrupulous preparation under the prime minister, a new invincible robot, Mechagodzilla, has now reached completion, armed with various weapons, including the most powerful gun in history.

Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S., 20041214000000 +0000, Mechagodzilla, the superior-armed, state-of-the-art, all-robot version of Godzilla, is undergoing repairs after his devastating battle against the world's monsters.

Godzilla: Final Wars, 20051213000000 +0000, Earth has been relatively peaceful since Godzilla was successfully buried deep in ice beneath the South Pole. Then - sometime a few years hence-several of his old nemeses return to wreak havoc on cities worldwide.

Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla 2, 19931211000000 +0000, Mechagodzilla® is the ultimate in Godzilla®-busting weaponry. Fueled by a nuclear reactor and sheathed in a synthetic diamond shield, the mammoth metal robot is Japan's greatest hope for ending Godzilla®'s reign of terror.

programme.title: Life Guardian
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E15, After Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning, Caroline seeks out the enigmatic, mysterious youth who helped her rescue one of the boys. Neely's ex-husband returns, complicating her life.

programme.title: Matters of the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E16, Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E21, Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts, putting the lifeguards on high alert. Meanwhile, Mitch has to save one of Kaye's employees whose violent husband has come looking for her.

programme.title: Rendezvous
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E17, When a young couple’s romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him… except CJ.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E18, While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E19, Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbor’s newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E20, CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.

programme.title: Golden Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E21, A crazed young woman is causing trouble on the Venice Boardwalk and Neely suspects it is more than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Newman meets his dream woman – who doesn’t speak English.

programme.title: Nevermore
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E22, A mysterious, disfigured man whom the public dubs "the phantom lifeguard," is secretly saving people and sending love notes to CJ. When CJ goes missing the team sets out to find her and the “phantom.”

programme.title: Rookie Summer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E01, Young, ambitious and sexy lifeguard candidates compete for a chance to attend Rookie School. Mitch is offered a promotion to Captain and has a tough decision to make. Lani McKensie faces the sinister return of a former lover.

programme.title: Next Generation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E02, Hobie, Lani, April, and Skylar are among the trainees competing for a few open slots as Baywatch Lifeguards. Hobie isn't sure he wants to follow in his father's footsteps, but when a vengeful jet skier comes after April, Hobie comes to her rescue.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E03, Veteran lifeguard Jack 'JD' Darius has a dark secret in his past. He comes to Baywatch to throw his rescue can in the ring for the open Lieutenant slot, but young and ambitious Taylor Walsh also wants the job, and she's ready to fight for it.

programme.title: Memorial Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E04, Mitch, Sky, and April find a dead man on the ocean floor. Their search for answers to his demise leads to the retirement home where he lived, and his two friends who seem to be hiding the true story. The chemistry between Cody and Lani heats up.

programme.title: Charlie
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E05, April is devastated by her younger brother Charlie’s terminal illness. Mitch and Hobie want to make sure Charlie's wishes are granted, and that the time he spends with the lifeguards at Baywatch is the best of his life.

programme.title: Lifeguard Confidential
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E06, Caroline's acting career isn't going well so she returns to Baywatch to figure out what she really wants to do with her life. The lifeguards are plagued by a sleaze-ball helicopter reporter who somehow knows intimate details about their love lives.

programme.title: Out of the Blue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E07, After the devastation of the last big L.A. earthquake, Baywatch lifeguards are taking recent Seismic activity seriously. Caroline and JD 's tempestuous relationship heats up, forcing Caroline to make a critical decision that could change her life.

programme.title: El Niño
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E08, The hot Santa Ana winds blow an air of mystery to Baywatch when two sea lions perish in an unexplainable event. Mitch must uncover the cause to stop it from happening again. April is courted by Manny and Hobie, forcing her to choose between them.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E09, Donna tries to help Neely overcome her addiction to painkillers. Craig Pomeroy shows up at Baywatch to defend the legal rights of an elderly Native American shaman determined to initiate his tribe's traditional death ritual on the Baywatch beach.
